name: Moonshot!
description:
This is a relatively simple game where you try to hit the moon as many times as you can with only three rockets!

First, use WASD to pan the camera and scout the moon, then right mouse button to recenter the camera and prepare to launch. Use the mouse to prepare the spring and angle your launch, left click to launch, and in flight, spacebar for a short boost. More points are awarded for a more difficult path!

PLEASE NOTE: IN BROWSER GAME MAY NOT WORK PROPERLY UNLESS RUN FULLSCREEN
